channel.title: fermentation on moench.dev
channel.description: Recent content in fermentation on moench.dev

item.title: a season calendar for fermentation nerds
item.description: season and fermentation calendar I’m quite excited about fermentation from time to time. My main issue is that most of the time I’m not aware of which fruits and vegetables have season. So to have this list always with me I build up a small site to have this informations always ready. Small but usefull feature set: You can search Multilanguage & Multiregion (at least in theory) Data can easily be extended the data and technology I pulled the data from various sources and wrote them together (a typical nighttime task).
